11 public partial class Register : Window
12 {
13 private bool placeholderUsername;
14 private bool placeholderPassword;
15 private bool placeholderPassword2;
16 private bool placeholderNom;
17 private bool placeholderCognom;
18 private bool placeholderCorreu;
19 private bool placeholderTelefon;
23 public Register()
24 {
25 InitializeComponent();
26 placeholderUsername = true;
27 placeholderPassword = true;
28 placeholderPassword2 = true;
29 placeholderNom = true;
30 placeholderCognom = true;
31 placeholderCorreu = true;
32 placeholderTelefon = true;
33 }
39 private void TxtBoxUser_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
40 {
41 if (placeholderUsername)
42 {
43 TxtBoxUser.Text = string.Empty;
44 TxtBoxUser.Foreground = Brushes.White;
45 placeholderUsername = false;
46 }
47 ComprovarButton();
48 }
54 private void TxtBoxUser_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
55 {
56 ComprovarButton();
57 if (TxtBoxUser.Text == string.Empty)
58 {
59 TxtBoxUser.Text = "Nom d'usuari";
60 TxtBoxUser.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
61 placeholderUsername = true;
62 }
63 }
69 private void PsswdRegister_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
70 {
71 if (placeholderPassword)
72 {
73 PsswdRegister.Password = string.Empty;
74 PsswdRegister.Foreground = Brushes.White;
75 placeholderPassword = false;
76 }
77 ComprovarButton();
78 }
84 private void PsswdRegister_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
85 {
86 ComprovarButton();
87 if (PsswdRegister.Password == string.Empty)
88 {
89 PsswdRegister.Password = "abcdef";
90 PsswdRegister.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
91 placeholderPassword = true;
92 }
93 }
99 private void PsswdRegister2_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
100 {
101 if (placeholderPassword2)
102 {
103 PsswdRegister2.Password = string.Empty;
104 PsswdRegister2.Foreground = Brushes.White;
105 placeholderPassword2 = false;
106 }
107 ComprovarButton();
108 }

121 placeholderPassword2 = true;
122 }
123 }

219 private void TxtBoxTelefon_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
220 {
221 if (placeholderTelefon)
222 {
223 TxtBoxTelefon.Text = string.Empty;
224 TxtBoxTelefon.Foreground = Brushes.White;
225 placeholderTelefon = false;
226 }
227 ComprovarButton();
228 }
234 private void TxtBoxTelefon_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
235 {
236 ComprovarButton();
237 if (TxtBoxTelefon.Text == string.Empty)
238 {
239 TxtBoxTelefon.Text = "633123123";
240 TxtBoxTelefon.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
241 placeholderTelefon = true;
242 }
243 }
247 private void ComprovarButton()
248 {
249 if (!(placeholderPassword || placeholderUsername || placeholderPassword2 || placeholderNom || placeholderCorreu) &&
250 TxtBoxUser.Text != string.Empty && PsswdRegister.Password != string.Empty && PsswdRegister2.Password != string.Empty && TxtBoxNom.Text != string.Empty && TxtBoxCorreu.Text != string.Empty)
251 {
252 BtnRegister.IsEnabled = true;
253 }
254 else BtnRegister.IsEnabled = false;
255 }
261 private void BtnRegister_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
262 {
263 UsuariModel u = new UsuariModel();
264 if (PsswdRegister.Password == PsswdRegister2.Password)
265 u.Contrasenya = PsswdRegister.Password;
266 u.Username = TxtBoxUser.Text;
267 u.Nom = TxtBoxNom.Text;
268 if (!placeholderCognom)
269 u.Cognom = TxtBoxCognom.Text;
270 else u.Cognom = string.Empty;
271 u.Correu = TxtBoxCorreu.Text;
272 if (!placeholderTelefon)
273 u.Telefon = TxtBoxTelefon.Text;
274 else u.Telefon = string.Empty;
275 UsuariNegoci uNegoci = new UsuariNegoci();
276 uNegoci.Usuari = u;
277 uNegoci.Inserir();
278 MessageBox.Show($"S'ha registrat a l'usuari {u.Username} amb èxit!");
279 u = uNegoci.GetUsuari(u.Username);
280 MainWindow main = new MainWindow(u);
281 main.Show();
282 this.Close();
283 }
289 private void Escriure(object sender, System.Windows.Controls.TextChangedEventArgs e)
290 {
291 if (IsInitialized)
292 ComprovarButton();
293 }
299 private void Escriure(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
300 {
301 if (IsInitialized)
302 ComprovarButton();
303 }
304 }
305}
